_meanings:
{@--1@} Not used or 
employed, not applied.

{@--3@} (In <ab>Rhet.</ab>) Rare,
unusual (as a word when used in
a particular sense or gender though
that sense or gender be sanctioned
by lexicographers); {#aprayuktaM#} 
{#taTAmnAtamapi kaviBirnAdftaM; taTA manye dEvatosya piSAco#}
{#rAkzaso'TavA .#} where the <ab>mas.</ab> gender
of {#dEvata#}, though sanctioned (by
<ls>Amara</ls>), is not used by poets and
is, therefore, {#aprayukta#}.
